definition[0]: a twist in something that is normally straight
example[0]: The water hose had a kink in it.
definition[1]: a small problem in a plan, system etc
example[1]: Given the size of the task, a few kinks are inevitable.
definition[2]: something strange or dangerous in someoneâ€™s character
definition[3]: to have, get, or make a kink
example[2]: Take care to avoid kinking the wire.
